channel.title: Certifications on gavinmassey.net
channel.description: Recent content in Certifications on gavinmassey.net

item.title: AWS Cloud Practitioners Exam Guide, Part 1 - Introduction
item.description: Welcome to our in-depth guide tailored to help you ace the AWS Cloud Practitioner Exam. This series is dedicated to condensing the vast world of AWS into digestible, focused articles that cover all the crucial topics you need to know for the exam. From cloud fundamentals to the specifics of AWS services, security, and compliance, each section is designed to equip you with a comprehensive understanding of AWS concepts and best practices.

item.title: AWS Cloud Practitioners Exam Guide, Part 2 - "Knowledge of" Sections
item.description: Article Series Index Part 1 - Introduction Part 2 - “Knowledge of” Sections Part 3 - “Skill in” Sections Part 4 - Technologies and Concepts Part 5 - In Scope Services Part 6 - Summary The following compilation includes content exclusively from the ‘Knowledge of’ sections of the AWS Cloud Practitioners Exam Guide. These sections have been systematically divided and organized into separate articles for your convenience. For comprehensive information, please refer to the corresponding sections in the other parts of this guide.

item.title: AWS Cloud Practitioners Exam Guide, Part 6 - Summary
item.description: Article Series Index Part 1 - Introduction Part 2 - “Knowledge of” Sections Part 3 - “Skill in” Sections Part 4 - Technologies and Concepts Part 5 - In Scope Services Part 6 - Summary These relative URLs should work within your Hugo site, assuming your site structure aligns with the directory structure you’ve provided. Make sure to double-check that the folder and file names are correct in your Hugo project.
